game.name: Harpoon
game.shortDescription: Top Down Shooter, a game where the player will have to dive into the endless depths of the sea as a diver and face thousands of predatory marine life, shooting back at them, pumping their weapons and equipment, gaining points and passing more and more, setting new records!

reviewHighlights.text: Crapoon Another unpolished game engine template shovelware from Laush Studio. Awful "Retro" graphics which is basically low resolution stick figures....
Harpoon is yet another construction kit template copy+paste from serial Russian shovelware pushers, Laush Studio/Repa Games/Falco Software. These guys...
